title: Biden suggests Trump is appeasing Russia
shortDescription: In an interview with the BBC's Nick Robinson, President Joe Biden suggests President Donald Trump is appeasing Russia.

title: Trump children arrive at inauguration
shortDescription: Donald Trump Jr., Ivanka Trump, Eric Trump, Tiffany Trump and Barron Trump arrive at and walk into their father’s swearing in ceremony.

title: Israel says 24 hostages alive in Gaza after Trump comment alarms families
shortDescription: Trump's comment prompted the group representing the families of hostages to ask the Israeli government to share any new information with them immediately.

title: Biden calls Trump 'foolish' in peace talks with Russia, Ukraine
shortDescription: Former President Joe Biden accused President Donald Trump of 'modern-day appeasement' of Russia in peace talks with Ukraine, in an interview with BBC.

title: Democrats attack Trump's 'corrupt' connections to crypto
shortDescription: Democrats are investigating Trump's connections and derailing legislation that would legitimize digital currencies.

title: 'Power to fight back': Illinois Democrat announces his bid for Senate
shortDescription: Illinois Democrat Rep. Raja Krishnamoorthi announced he will be running for Senate, after Sen. Dick Durbin said he won’t seek reelection.

title: Florida Gov. DeSantis to sign bill banning fluoride in state's drinking water
shortDescription: During a news conference, DeSantis said that it is "forced medication when they're jamming fluoride into your water supply."

title: Supreme Court allows Trump's trans military ban
shortDescription: The Supreme Court will allow President Trump's ban on transgender troops serving in the military to take effect while court challenges continue.

title: House Republicans warn Trump administration on Social Security cuts
shortDescription: In a letter, 15 House Republicans emphasize the importance of Social Security, advise against cuts.

title: Trump taps Rudy Giuliani's son to lead 2026 World Cup task force
shortDescription: President Trump named Andrew Giuliani, son of close ally Rudy Giuliani, executive director of the president's task force on the 2026 FIFA World Cup.

title: Trump vs. Canada: A timeline of tariffs, sleights and stern exchanges
shortDescription: As Canada's new prime minister sits down with Trump for the first time, the two nations are locked in an economic, and rhetorical, back-and-forth

title: Trump, Carney debate annexing Canada as 51st state
shortDescription: Canada's Prime Minister Mark Carney and President Donald Trump debated annexing Canada as 51st state during a White House visit.

title: Judge blocks Trump from closing agency that funds museums, libraries
shortDescription: Trump's executive order had targeted the U.S. Institute of Museum and Library Services and Minority Business Development Agency.

title: Trump mocks Obama's 'disaster' of a library, offers to help finish it
shortDescription: The two presidents continue to throw shade at each other despite sharing a laugh at former President Jimmy Carter's funeral earlier this year.

title: Senate confirms Trump's pick to lead Social Security Administration
shortDescription: Wall Street veteran Frank Bisignano is Trump's pick to lead an agency that Americans interact with from cradle to grave.

title: 19 states sue RFK Jr., Trump administration for overhauling HHS
shortDescription: Plus: Israel readies a plan to seize all of Gaza. | Trump says he knew 'nothing' about an AI image of him as the pope.

title: Supreme Court hands Trump a win, allows ban on transgender troops to take effect
shortDescription: The Trump administration asked the Supreme Court to intervene after a pause on the Pentagon's new ban on transgender people serving in the military.

title: Kristi Noem tells lawmakers Trump wants to abolish FEMA
shortDescription: Homeland Security Secretary Kristi Noem appeared before a congressional committee May 6, where she said Trump wants to end FEMA.

title: Trump budget proposal aims to cut $163 billion | The Excerpt
shortDescription: Plus: A new policy means zero tolerance for visa holders. | President Trump says he's revoking Harvard's tax-exempt status.
